ReferenceBlocks.text: The second woe is past. Behold, the third woe comes quickly.

block.text: Orait namba 2 bikpela hevi em i pinis. Tasol harim. Liklik taim tasol na namba 3 bikpela hevi bai i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The seventh angel sounded, and great voices in heaven followed, saying,

block.text: Orait namba 7 ensel i winim biugel bilong en, na mi harim ol lain i stap long heven i singaut strong olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The kingdoms of the world have become the Kingdoms of our Lord, and of his Christ. He will reign forever and ever!”

block.text: "Bikpela bilong yumi wantaim dispela man em I makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en, tupela i kamap king bilong olgeta hap bilong graun. Na Bikpela bai i stap king oltaim oltaim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The twenty-four elders, who sit on their thrones before God’s throne, fell on their faces and worshiped God,
saying:

block.text: Na dispela 24 hetman i save sindaun long sia bilong ol long ai bilong God, ol i brukim skru na putim pes bilong ol i go daun long graun, na ol i lotu long God.
Ol i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We give you thanks, Lord God, the Almighty, the one who is and who was, and is to come; because you have taken your great power, and reigned.

block.text: "Bikpela, yu God I Gat Olgeta Strong. Yu stap nau, na bipo tru yu stap. Yu kisim pinis bikpela strong bilong yu, na yu kamap king tru. Olsem na mipela i tenkyu long yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The nations were angry, and your wrath came, as did the time for the dead to be judged, and to give your bondservants the prophets, their reward, as well as to the saints, and those who fear your name, to the small and the great; and to destroy those who destroy the earth.”

block.text: Ol haiden i belhat tru, tasol taim bilong yu long belhat em i kamap pinis. Nau em i taim bilong ol man i dai pinis ol i mas kamap long kot bilong yu. Nau em i taim bilong givim gutpela pe long ol wokman bilong yu, em ol profet, na long ol manmeri bilong yu, na long olgeta man i save pret long yu na i stap aninit long yu, em ol man i gat nem na ol man i no gat nem tu. Nau em i taim bilong bagarapim ol man i bin bagarapim graun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: God’s temple that is in heaven was opened, and the ark of the Lord’s covenant was seen in his temple. Lightnings, sounds, thunders, an earthquake, and great hail followed.

block.text: Ol hetman i tok pinis, orait ol ensel i opim haus bilong God i stap long heven, na ol i lukim Bokis Kontrak bilong God em i stap ples klia insait long haus bilong em. Na lait bilong klaut i sut i go nabaut na bikpela nois i kamap na klaut i pairap, na graun i guria na planti ren ais i kam daun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 12
A great sign was seen in heaven: a woman clothed with the sun, and the moon under her feet, and on her head a crown of twelve stars.

block.text: Orait wanpela narakain mak tru i kamap long skai. Dispela mak i olsem. Wanpela meri i stap, na em i pasim san olsem klos bilong en. Na mun i stap aninit long lek bilong en, na 12 -pela sta i stap olsem hat long het bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: She was with child. She cried out in pain, laboring to give birth.

block.text: Dispela meri i gat bel, na pen bilong karim pikinini em i kamap pinis long em. Em i laik karim pikinini, na em i pilim pen nogut tru, olsem na em i singaut strong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Another sign was seen in heaven. Behold, a great red dragon, having seven heads and ten horns, and on his heads seven crowns.

block.text: Na narapela mak i kamap long skai. Dispela mak em i olsem. Wanpela traipela retpela snek i stap. Em i gat 7 -pela het, na 10 -pela kom i kamap long ol het bilong en. Na 7 -pela hat olsem ol hat bilong king i stap long ol het bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His tail drew one third of the stars of the sky, and threw them to the earth.

block.text: Tel bilong en i brumim tru bikpela lain sta bilong skai na tromoi ol i go long graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The dragon stood before the woman who was about to give birth, so that when she gave birth he might devour her child.

block.text: I olsem ol i tilim ol sta long tripela lain, na wanpela lain sta olgeta i pundaun. na em i wetim meri i karim pikinini pinis, bai em i ken kaikai dispela pikinini.

ReferenceBlocks.text: She gave birth to a son, a male child, who is to rule all the nations with a rod of iron. Her child was caught up to God, and to his throne.

block.text: Na meri i karim pikinini man, em pikinini God i makim bilong holim stik ain na bosim strong olgeta lain manmeri. Meri i karim pikinini pinis, orait kwiktaim ol i kisim pikinini i go antap, na ol i bringim em i go long God na long sia king bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The woman fled into the wilderness, where she has a place prepared by God, that there they may nourish her one thousand two hundred sixty days.

block.text: Na dispela meri em i ranawe i go long hap i no gat man. Long dispela hap God i redim pinis ples bilong em i ken i stap long en, na ol bai i lukautim em na givim kaikai long em inap long 1,260 de.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There was war in the sky. Michael and his angels made war on the dragon. The dragon and his angels made war.

block.text: Orait nau bikpela pait i kirap long heven. Maikel wantaim ol ensel bilong en ol i pait long dispela traipela snek. Na snek wantaim ol ensel bilong en ol i bekim pait long ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: They didn’t prevail, neither was a place found for him any more in heaven.

block.text: tasol ol i no gat strong bilong winim pait. Olsem na ol i no inap i stap moa long heven,

ReferenceBlocks.text: The great dragon was thrown down, the old serpent, he who is called the devil and Satan, the deceiver of the whole world. He was thrown down to the earth, and his angels were thrown down with him.

block.text: na ol ensel bilong God i tromoi dispela snek i go daun. Em dispela snek bilong bipo yet, na ol i kolim em Satan na "Man I Save Kotim Olgeta Manmeri." Em i man bilong giamanim olgeta manmeri bilong graun. Ol i tromoi em i go daun long graun, na ol i tromoi ol ensel bilong en i go daun wantaim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I heard a loud voice in heaven, saying,

block.text: Na long heven mi harim maus bilong wanpela man i singaut strong olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Now the salvation, the power, and the Kingdom of our God, and the authority of his Christ has come; for the accuser of our brothers has been thrown down, who accuses them before our God day and night.

block.text: "Nau God bilong yumi em i kisim bek yumi pinis, na strong bilong en i kamap pinis long ples klia, na em i stap king. Na dispela man em i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en, em i kisim pinis bikpela namba na strong. Long wanem, dispela man bilong kotim ol brata bilong yumi, em i bin kotim ol long ai bilong God bilong yumi long san na long nait, tasol nau ol ensel i tromoi em i go daun pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They overcame him because of the Lamb’s blood, and because of the word of their testimony. They didn’t love their life, even to death.

block.text: Ol brata bilong yumi ol i no bin laikim tumas laip bilong ol yet, na ol i no tingting strong long ol i mas i stap gut long graun. Nogat. Ol i bin kisim strong long blut bilong Pikinini Sipsip na ol i strong long autim tok bilong em, maski ol birua i kilim ol i dai. Na long dispela pasin ol i winim pait na daunim dispela birua.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore rejoice, heavens, and you who dwell in them. Woe to those who live in the earth and of the sea, because the devil has gone down to you, having great wrath, knowing that he has but a short time.”

block.text: Olsem na yu heven, na yupela olgeta lain i stap long heven, yupela i ken amamas. Tasol yu graun, na yu solwara, yupela lukaut. Bikpela hevi i laik kamap long yupela. Satan i go daun pinis long yupela, na em i belhat nogut tru. Em i save, em i gat sotpela taim tasol bilong i stap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the dragon saw that he was thrown down to the earth, he persecuted the woman who gave birth to the male child.

block.text: Dispela snek em i lukim olsem ol i tromoi em i go daun pinis long graun, na em i go ranim dispela meri i bin karim pikinini man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Two wings of the great eagle were given to the woman, that she might fly into the wilderness to her place, so that she might be nourished for a time, and times, and half a time, from the face of the serpent.

block.text: Tasol ol i givim tupela wing bilong bikpela tarangau long dispela meri, bai em inap flai i go long ples bilong en long graun i no gat man, na em i ken i stap longwe long dispela snek. Na long dispela hap ol bai i lukautim em gut na givim kaikai long em, i go inap long 3 na hap yia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The serpent spewed water out of his mouth after the woman like a river, that he might cause her to be carried away by the stream.

block.text: Orait dispela snek i trautim wara long maus bilong en. Dispela wara i kamap olsem bikpela wara na i ran i go bihainim meri. Snek i laik bai wara i kisim dispela meri na bagarapim meri olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The earth helped the woman, and the earth opened its mouth and swallowed up the river which the dragon spewed out of his mouth.

block.text: Tasol graun i helpim meri. Graun i opim maus bilong en na i dringim dispela wara, snek i bin trautim long maus bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The dragon grew angry with the woman, and went away to make war with the rest of her seed, who keep God’s commandments and have the testimony of Jesus Christ.

block.text: Olsem na snek em i belhat long dispela meri, na em i go na i laik pait long ol arapela pikinini bilong en, em ol dispela manmeri i save bihainim ol lo bilong God, na ol i save autim tok bilong Jisas na bihainim em.Na snek i sanap i stap long nambis bilong solwara.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 13
Then I stood on the sand of the sea. I saw a beast coming up out of the sea, having ten horns and seven heads. On his horns were ten crowns, and on his heads, blasphemous names.

block.text: Na mi lukim wanpela wel animal i kamap long solwara. Em i gat 7 -pela het na 10 -pela kom i kamap long ol het bilong en. Na 10 -pela hat olsem ol hat bilong king i stap long ol kom bilong en. Long ol het bilong en ol nem i stap, na as bilong ol dispela nem em ol kain kain pasin bilong tok bilas long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The beast which I saw was like a leopard, and his feet were like those of a bear, and his mouth like the mouth of a lion. The dragon gave him his power, his throne, and great authority.

block.text: Dispela wel animal nau mi lukim, em i olsem bikpela wel pusi ol i kolim lepat, na lek bilong en i olsem lek bilong bea, na maus bilong en i olsem maus bilong laion. Na dispela snek i givim strong bilong em yet long dispela wel animal. Em i mekim em i stap king olsem em yet, na em i givim bikpela strong long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: One of his heads looked like it had been wounded fatally. His fatal wound was healed, and the whole earth marveled at the beast.

block.text: I luk olsem ol i bin sutim wanpela het bilong dispela wel animal na kilim em i dai. Tasol dispela sua nogut em i drai pinis, na i orait gen. Na olgeta manmeri ol i kirap nogut long lukim dispela wel animal, na ol i bihainim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They worshiped the dragon, because he gave his authority to the beast, and they worshiped the beast, saying,

block.text: Ol manmeri i save olsem traipela snek i bin givim strong bilong em yet long dispela wel animal, olsem na ol i lotuim dispela snek. Na ol i lotuim wel animal tu, na ol i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who is like the beast? Who is able to make war with him?”

block.text: "Husat em i wankain olsem dispela wel animal? Husat inap long pait long em?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: A mouth speaking great things and blasphemy was given to him. Authority to make war for forty-two months was given to him.

block.text: Orait God i larim dispela wel animal na em i bikmaus nabaut na i tok bilas long God. Na em i gat strong bilong mekim dispela pasin inap long 42 mun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He opened his mouth for blasphemy against God, to blaspheme his name, and his dwelling, those who dwell in heaven.

block.text: Olsem na em i opim maus bilong en na em i tok bilas long God. Em i tok nogut long nem bilong God na long ples bilong God na long ol lain bilong God i stap long heven.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It was given to him to make war with the saints, and to overcome them. Authority over every tribe, people, language, and nation was given to him.

block.text: Na God i larim em na em i pait long ol manmeri bilong God, na em i winim pait na i daunim ol. Na em i kisim strong bilong bosim ol manmeri bilong olgeta lain man na bilong olgeta kantri na bilong olgeta tok ples na bilong olgeta kain skin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All who dwell on the earth will worship him, everyone whose name has not been written from the foundation of the world in the book of life of the Lamb who has been killed.

block.text: Olgeta manmeri long graun, nem bilong ol i no i stap long buk bilong laip long taim God i no mekim graun i kamap yet, ol bai i lotu long dispela wel animal. Dispela buk bilong laip, em buk bilong Pikinini Sipsip, bipo ol i bin kilim em i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone has an ear, let him hear.

block.text: Man i gat yau, em i mas harim gut dispela tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone is to go into captivity, he will go into captivity. If anyone is to be killed with the sword, he must be killed. Here is the endurance and the faith of the saints.

block.text: Sapos God i makim wanpela man bilong i go long kalabus, orait em i mas i go long kalabus. Na sapos em i makim wanpela man bilong ol i kilim em i dai long bainat, orait ol bai i kilim em i dai long bainat. Na taim dispela kain pasin i kamap, orait ol manmeri bilong God i mas i stap strong na holimpas bilip bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw another beast coming up out of the earth. He had two horns like a lamb, and he spoke like a dragon.

block.text: Orait mi lukim narapela wel animal i kirap insait long graun na i kam antap. Long het bilong en tupela kom i kamap olsem ol kom bilong pikinini sipsip, na toktok bilong en em i olsem toktok bilong wanpela bikpela snek.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He exercises all the authority of the first beast in his presence. He makes the earth and those who dwell in it to worship the first beast, whose fatal wound was healed.

block.text: Long taim dispela namba 2 wel animal em i stap wantaim namba wan wel animal, em i kisim olgeta strong bilong namba wan wel animal. Na em i wok strong long mekim graun wantaim ol manmeri i stap long graun ol i lotu long dispela namba wan wel animal, em i bin kisim sua nogut inap long kilim em i dai, tasol dispela sua em i drai pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He performs great signs, even making fire come down out of the sky to the earth in the sight of people.

block.text: Namba 2 wel animal em i wokim ol kain kain bikpela mirakel. Wanpela kain mirakel em i olsem. Long ai bilong ol manmeri em i mekim paia i lusim heven na i kam daun long graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He deceives my own people who dwell on the earth because of the signs he was granted to do in front of the beast; saying to those who dwell on the earth:

block.text: God i larim em i wokim ol kain kain mirakel long ai bilong namba wan wel animal, na long dispela pasin em i giamanim ol manmeri bilong graun. Em i tokim ol manmeri olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Make an image to the beast who was wounded by the sword and lived.”

block.text: "Yupela i mas wokim piksa bilong dispela wel animal, bilong litimapim nem bilong en. Em dispela wel animal bipo bainat i bin kilim em, tasol em i stap laip yet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: It was given to him to give breath to it, to the image of the beast, that the image of the beast should both speak, and cause as many as wouldn’t worship the image of the beast to be killed.

block.text: Na God i larim em na em i givim win bilong laip long piksa bilong wel animal, na dispela piksa i mekim toktok. Na sapos sampela man i no laik lotu long piksa bilong wel animal, orait em i gat strong bilong kilim ol i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He causes all, the small and the great, the rich and the poor, and the free and the slave, to be given marks on their right hands, or on their foreheads.

block.text: Orait namba 2 wel animal i tok na ol i putim wanpela mak long han sut na long pes bilong olgeta manmeri, maski ol i manmeri nating o ol i gat nem, na maski ol i gat planti mani o ol i stap rabis, na maski ol i stap fri o ol i wokboi na wokmeri nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: No one would be able to buy or to sell unless he has that mark, the name of the beast or the number of his name.

block.text: Na sapos man i no gat dispela mak bilong nem bilong wel animal o sapos em i no gat namba bilong nem bilong en, orait em i no inap baim samting long ol arapela manmeri na ol i no inap baim samting long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Here is wisdom. He who has understanding, let him calculate the number of the beast, for it is the number of a man. His number is six hundred sixty-six.

block.text: Man i gat gutpela tingting, em inap save gut long dispela samting. Man i gat save, em i mas kaunim gut namba bilong wel animal. Dispela namba em i namba bilong wanpela man, na namba bilong dispela man em 666 .

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 14
I saw, and behold, the Lamb standing on Mount Zion, and with him a number, one hundred forty-four thousand, having his name, and the name of his Father, written on their foreheads.

block.text: Mi lukluk gen, na mi lukim Pikinini Sipsip i sanap long maunten Saion, na 144,000 manmeri i sanap wantaim em. Nem bilong Pikinini Sipsip na nem bilong Papa bilong en, dispela nem God i bin raitim long pes bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I heard a sound from heaven, like the sound of many waters, and like the sound of a great thunder. The sound which I heard was like that of harpists playing on their harps.

block.text: Na mi harim gutpela nois i kam long heven, em i olsem nois bilong bikpela wara i pairap, na olsem bikpela nois bilong klaut i pairap. Mi harim dispela nois em i olsem musik. Em i olsem ol man i paitim gita na musik i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They sing a new song before the throne, and before the four living creatures and the elders. No one could learn the song except the one hundred forty-four thousand, those who had been redeemed out of the earth.

block.text: Ol dispela manmeri i sanap long pes bilong sia king bilong God na long ai bilong ol 4 -pela samting i stap laip na long ai bilong ol hetman, na ol i singim wanpela nupela song. Dispela 144,000 manmeri God i bin baim bek ol namel long olgeta manmeri bilong graun, ol tasol inap long kisim save long dispela song. Na i no gat narapela man moa inap kisim save long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These are those who were not defiled with women, for they are virgins. These are those who follow the Lamb wherever he goes. These were redeemed by Jesus from among men, the first fruits to God and to the Lamb.

block.text: Dispela ol man ol i no bin slip wantaim ol meri na kamap doti. Nogat. Ol i stap klin tru. Olgeta ples Pikinini Sipsip i laik i go long en, orait ol dispela man i save bihainim em i go. God i bin baim bek ol dispela lain namel long olgeta manmeri bilong graun, na ol i stap olsem namba wan lain God i kisim bek, bai ol i stap ol lain bilong em yet na bilong Pikinini Sipsip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In their mouth was found no lie, for they are blameless before the throne of God.

block.text: Ol i no bin mekim tok giaman. Nogat. Ol i no gat asua long wanpela samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw an angel flying in mid heaven, having an eternal Good News to proclaim to those who dwell on the earth, and to every nation, tribe, language, and people.

block.text: Orait mi lukim narapela ensel i flai i go namel long skai. Em i gat gutnius bilong i stap oltaim oltaim, na em i gat wok bilong autim dispela gutnius long ol manmeri i stap long graun. Em i autim long ol manmeri bilong olgeta lain man na bilong olgeta kantri na bilong olgeta tok ples na bilong olgeta kain skin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said with a loud voice,

block.text: Em i singaut strong olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Fear the Lord, and give him glory; for the hour of his judgment has come. Worship him who made the heaven, the earth, the sea, and the springs of waters!”

block.text: "Taim i kamap pinis bilong God i skelim pasin bilong olgeta man long kot. Olsem na yupela i mas pret long em na litimapim nem bilong em. Yupela i mas lotu long God, em i bin wokim heven na graun na solwara na olgeta hul wara."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Another, a second angel, followed, saying,

block.text: Narapela ensel i bihainim namba wan ensel na i kam. Dispela namba 2 ensel i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Babylon the great has fallen, which has made all the nations to drink of the wine of the wrath of her sexual immorality.”

block.text: "Bikpela taun Babilon em i bagarap pinis! Yes, em i bagarap pinis! Dispela taun Babilon tasol em i bin mekim olgeta lain manmeri ol i bihainim strongpela pasin pamuk bilong em. I olsem em i bin givim strongpela wain long ol na ol i dringim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Another angel, a third, followed them, saying with a great voice,

block.text: Na narapela ensel i bihainim dispela tupela ensel na i kam. Dispela namba 3 ensel em i singaut strong olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If anyone worships the beast and his image, and receives a mark on his forehead, or on his hand,

block.text: "Sapos wanpela man i lotu long dispela wel animal na long piksa bilong en, na em i kisim mak long pes na long han bilong en,

ReferenceBlocks.text: he also will drink of the wine of the wrath of God, which is prepared unmixed in the cup of his anger. He will be tormented with fire and sulfur in the presence of the holy angels, and in the presence of the Lamb.

block.text: orait bai em i mas dringim wanpela kain wain. Dispela wain em belhat bilong God. Na God bai i no inap tanim wara wantaim dispela wain pastaim. Nogat. Em bai i kapsaitim belhat bilong en long kap bilong bekim pe nogut, na dispela man i mas dringim. Na long ai bilong ol ensel bilong God, na long ai bilong Pikinini Sipsip, dispela man bai i kisim pen nogut long paia na long ston salfa i paia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The smoke of their torment goes up forever and ever. They have no rest day and night, those who worship the beast and his image, and whoever receives the mark of his name.

block.text: Na smok i kamap long dispela paia i givim pen long ol, em bai i go antap oltaim oltaim. Ol dispela man i save lotu long wel animal na long piksa bilong en, na i kisim mak bilong nem bilong en, ol bai i no kisim malolo long san na long nait."

ReferenceBlocks.text: This calls for patient endurance on the part of the saints, those who keep the commandments of God, and the faith of Jesus.”

block.text: Taim dispela kain pasin i kamap, ol manmeri bilong God i mas i stap strong, em ol manmeri i save bihainim ol lo bilong God na holimpas bilip bilong ol long Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I heard the voice from heaven saying,

block.text: Mi harim maus bilong wanpela man i singaut long heven olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Write, ‘Blessed are the dead who die in the Lord from now on.’”

block.text: "Yu raitim tok olsem, 'Nau na olgeta taim bihain, ol manmeri i bilip long Bikpela na ol i dai, ol i ken amamas."

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yes,”
says the Spirit,

block.text: Na Holi Spirit em tu i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “that they may rest from their labors; for their works follow with them.”

block.text: "Ol i ken amamas tru, long wanem, ol i lusim dispela hatwok ol i bin mekim, na ol i ken malolo. Na ol i no i go nating. Nogat. Gutpela pasin ol i bin mekim, em i go wantaim ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: I looked, and behold, a white cloud; and on the cloud one sitting like a son of man. He had on his head a golden crown, and in his hand a sharp sickle.

block.text: Orait mi lukluk gen, na mi lukim wanpela waitpela klaut, na wanpela man i wankain olsem yumi man bilong graun i sindaun i stap long dispela klaut. Em i gat hat gol long het bilong en, na long han bilong en em i holim naip i sap tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Another angel came out from the temple, crying with a loud voice to him who sat on the cloud,

block.text: Na narapela ensel i kam ausait long haus bilong God. Em i singaut strong tru long dispela man i sindaun long klaut olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Send forth your sickle, and reap; for the hour to reap has come; for the harvest of the earth is ripe!”

block.text: "Kisim naip bilong yu na katim kaikai. Olgeta kaikai bilong graun i mau pinis, olsem na nau em i taim bilong katim dispela kaikai."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who sat on the cloud thrust his
sickle on the earth, and the earth was reaped.

block.text: Orait dispela man i sindaun long klaut em i
holim naip bilong en na em i lindaun i go daun long graun, na em i katim ol kaikai i mau i stap long graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Another angel came out from the temple which is in heaven. He also had a sharp sickle.

block.text: Na narapela ensel i lusim haus bilong God i stap long heven na i kam ausait. Em tu i holim naip i sap tumas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Another angel came out from the altar, he who has power over fire, and he called with a great voice to him who had the sharp sickle, saying,

block.text: Na narapela ensel gen em i lusim alta na i kam, em dispela ensel i gat strong bilong bosim paia. Em i singaut strong long ensel i holim naip i sap tru. Em i tok olsem,

block.characterId: angel, coming out of temple, another

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: angel, coming out of temple, another
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Send forth your sharp sickle, and gather the clusters of the vine of the earth, for the earth’s grapes are fully ripe!”

block.text: "Ol pikinini wain bilong graun i mau pinis, olsem na yu kisim dispela naip bilong yu i sap moa, na katim ol pikinini bilong ol diwai wain bilong graun, na bungim i stap long wanpela hap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The angel thrust his sickle into the earth, and gathered the vintage of the earth, and threw it into the great winepress of the wrath of God.

block.text: Orait dispela ensel i kisim naip bilong en na em i lindaun i go daun long graun, na em i katim ol pikinini wain bilong graun, na i bungim i stap. Na em i tromoi ol dispela pikinini wain i go insait long bikpela tang ston bilong krungutim ol pikinini wain. Dispela em i makim belhat bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The winepress was trodden outside of the city, and blood came out from the winepress, even to the bridles of the horses, as far as one thousand six hundred stadia.

block.text: Na ol i krungutim ol pikinini wain long dispela tang i stap ausait long biktaun, na blut i kamap na i ran i kam ausait long tang, na i ran i go karamapim olgeta graun i go inap 300 kilomita. Na blut i kam antap inap long mak bilong hap ain i stap long maus bilong ol hos.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 15
I saw another great and marvelous sign in the sky: seven angels having the seven last plagues, for in them God’s wrath is finished.

block.text: Orait mi lukim narapela narakain mak i kamap long skai, na mi kirap nogut tru. Mi lukim 7 -pela ensel i stap, na ol i holim 7 -pela samting nogut tru bilong bagarapim ol manmeri. Na taim dispela ol samting nogut i pinis, orait i no gat narapela moa bai i kamap. Long dispela 7 -pela samting nogut, belhat bilong God bai i pinis tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw something like a sea of glass mixed with fire, and those who overcame the beast, his image, and the number of his name, standing on the sea of glass, having harps of God.

block.text: Na mi lukim wanpela samting olsem bikpela solwara ol i bin wokim long glas na paia wantaim. Ol manmeri i bin winim pait na daunim dispela wel animal wantaim piksa bilong en na namba i makim nem bilong en, ol i sanap i stap long arere bilong dispela solwara i olsem glas, na ol i holim ol gita samting God i bin givim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They sang the song of Moses, the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb, saying,

block.text: Ol i singim song bilong Moses, em wokman bilong God, na song bilong Pikinini Sipsip. Dispela song i olsem,

block.characterId: conquerors of beast, image & his name

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: conquerors of beast, image & his name
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Great and marvelous are your works, Lord God, the Almighty! Righteous and true are your ways, you King of saints.

block.text: "Bikpela, yu God I Gat Olgeta Strong, yu save mekim ol narakain strongpela wok, na taim mipela i lukim mipela i save kirap nogut tru. King bilong olgeta lain manmeri, ol pasin bilong yu ol i stret na i tru olgeta.

block.characterId: conquerors of beast, image & his name

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: conquerors of beast, image & his name
ReferenceBlocks.text: Who wouldn’t fear you, Lord, and glorify your name? For you only are holy. For all the nations will come and worship before you. For your righteous acts have been revealed.”

block.text: Bikpela, yu wanpela tasol yu stap holi. Olsem na olgeta manmeri ol i mas pret long yu na litimapim nem bilong yu. Olgeta lain man bai i kam na lotu long yu. Long wanem, stretpela pasin bilong yu i kamap ples klia pinis."

ReferenceBlocks.text: After these things I looked, and the temple of the tabernacle of the testimony in heaven was opened.

block.text: Bihain long dispela mi lukluk gen, na haus bilong God, em haus lotu sel long heven, em i op. Em haus lotu sel bilong God i kamapim tok tru bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The seven angels who had the seven plagues came out, clothed with pure, bright linen, and wearing golden sashes around their breasts.

block.text: Na dispela 7 -pela ensel i holim 7 -pela samting nogut tru bilong bagarapim ol manmeri, ol i lusim haus bilong God na i kam ausait. Ol i bin pasim ol naispela laplap i klin tumas na i lait tru. Na ol i bin pasim ol let gol i raunim bros bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: One of the four living creatures gave to the seven angels seven golden bowls full of the wrath of God, who lives forever and ever.

block.text: Na wanpela bilong dispela 4 -pela samting i stap laip, em i kisim 7 -pela dis gol na givim long ol 7 -pela ensel. Na belhat bilong God i save stap oltaim oltaim, dispela em i pulap long ol 7 -pela dis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The temple was filled with smoke from the glory of God, and from his power. No one was able to enter into the temple, until the seven plagues of the seven angels would be finished.

block.text: Na smok bilong lait na strong bilong God, em i pulap long haus bilong en. Na i no gat wanpela inap i go insait long haus bilong en. Nogat. Ol i mas wetim ol 7 -pela ensel i pinisim wok long dispela 7 -pela samting nogut pastaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 16
I heard a loud voice out of the temple, saying to the seven angels,

block.text: Orait mi harim maus bilong wanpela man i kamap insait long haus bilong God. Em i singaut strong long dispela 7 -pela ensel olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Go and pour out the seven bowls of the wrath of God on the earth!”

block.text: "Yupela i mas kisim dispela 7 -pela dis i gat belhat bilong God, na go kapsaitim i go daun long graun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The first went, and poured out his bowl into the earth, and it became a harmful and evil sore on the people who had the mark of the beast, and who worshiped his image.

block.text: Na namba wan ensel i go kapsaitim dis bilong en antap long graun. Na ol kain kain strongpela sua nogut tru i kamap long skin bilong ol man i gat mak bilong wel animal na i save lotu long piksa bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The second angel poured out his bowl into the sea, and it became blood as of a dead man. Every living thing in the sea died.

block.text: Na namba 2 ensel i kapsaitim dis bilong en antap long solwara. Na solwara i kamap olsem blut bilong man i dai pinis. Na olgeta samting i stap laip long solwara, ol i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The third poured out his bowl into the rivers and springs of water, and they became blood.

block.text: Na namba 3 ensel i kapsaitim dis bilong en antap long ol bikpela wara na ol hul wara. Na dispela olgeta wara i kamap blut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I heard the angel of the waters saying,

block.text: Na mi harim ensel i bosim ol wara i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You are righteous, who are and who were and shall be, you Holy One, because you have judged these things.

block.text: "God, yu stap nau, na bipo tru yu stap. Pasin bilong yu em i gutpela na stretpela olgeta, na yu holi tru. Yu skelim pinis pasin bilong ol dispela man, na taim yu tok long ol dispela samting nogut i mas kamap long ol, dispela tok bilong yu em i stret olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For they poured out the blood of the saints and the prophets, and you have given them blood to drink. They deserve this.”

block.text: Ol dispela man ol i bin kilim i dai ol profet na ol manmeri bilong yu, na mekim blut bilong ol i kapsait. Olsem na yu givim blut long ol dispela man nogut, bai ol i dring. Na dispela blut ol i dringim, em i bekim stret pasin nogut ol i bin mekim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: I heard another out of the altar saying,

block.text: Na mi harim alta i singaut olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yes, Lord God, the Almighty, true and righteous are your judgments.”

block.text: "Bikpela, yu God I Gat Olgeta Strong. Yu save skelim pasin bilong ol manmeri long kot, na tru tumas, kot bilong yu em i tru na i stret olgeta."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The fourth poured out his bowl on the sun, and it was given to him to scorch men with fire.

block.text: Orait namba 4 ensel i kapsaitim dis bilong en antap long san, na God i larim paia bilong san i kamap strong tru na i kukim ol man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: People were scorched with great heat, and people blasphemed the name of God who has the power over these plagues. They didn’t repent and give him glory.

block.text: Dispela bikpela paia bilong san em i hat moa yet, na i kukim nogut ol dispela man. Na ol i tok nogut long nem bilong God, em God i gat strong bilong bosim ol dispela samting nogut i kamap long ol. Tasol ol i no tanim bel na litimapim nem bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The fifth poured out his bowl on the throne of the beast, and his kingdom was darkened. They gnawed their tongues because of the pain,

block.text: Na namba 5 ensel i kapsaitim dis bilong en antap long sia king bilong wel animal. Na tudak i kamap long ol lain man i stap aninit long strong bilong wel animal. Na pen ol i kisim em i kamap nogut tru, olsem na ol i kaikaim tang bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and they blasphemed the God of heaven because of their pains and their sores. They didn’t repent of their works.

block.text: Ol i ting long pen bilong ol na long ol sua i bin kamap long skin bilong ol, na ol i tok nogut long God bilong heven. Tasol ol i no tanim bel na givim baksait long ol pasin nogut ol i save mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The sixth poured out his bowl on the great river, the Euphrates. Its water was dried up, that the way might be prepared for the kings that come from the sunrise.

block.text: Na namba 6 ensel i kapsaitim dis bilong en antap long bikpela wara Yufretis. Na wara em i drai olgeta, bilong redim rot bilong ol king i kam long hap sankamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw coming
out of the mouth of the dragon, and
out of the mouth of the beast, and
out of the mouth of the false prophet, three unclean spirits, something like frogs.

block.text: Na mi lukim
tripela spirit nogut olsem rokrok, ol
i kamap long maus bilong dispela traipela snek na long maus bilong wel animal na
long maus bilong giaman profet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For they are spirits of demons, performing signs; They go forth to the kings of the whole inhabited earth, to gather them together for the war of that great day of God, the Almighty.

block.text: Ol dispela spirit nogut tru i save wokim ol kain kain mirakel, na ol i go nabaut long ol king bilong olgeta kantri bilong graun. Ol i laik mekim ol king i bringim ol ami bilong ol i kam bung, bai ol i ken kirapim pait long dispela bikpela de bilong God I Gat Olgeta Strong i kotim ol manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, I come like a thief. Blessed is he who watches, and keeps his clothes, so that he doesn’t walk naked, and they see his shame.”

block.text: "Harim. Wantu bai mi kam long yupela olsem ol stilman i save kam. Olsem na sapos man i no slip, na em i putim ol klos samting bilong en i stap klostu long em, orait dispela man i ken amamas, long wanem, em bai i no inap wokabaut as nating na ol manmeri bai i no inap lukim sem bilong en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He gathered them together into the place which is called in Hebrew, Megiddo.

block.text: Orait ol spirit nogut i bringim ol king i kam bung long dispela hap, long tok Hibru ol i kolim Armagedon.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The seventh poured out his bowl into the air. A loud voice came forth out of the temple of heaven, from the throne, saying,

block.text: Na namba 7 ensel i kapsaitim dis bilong en long skai. Na insait long haus bilong God, maus bilong wanpela man i kamap long sia king bilong God, na i singaut strong olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is done!”

block.text: "Em i pinis nau."

ReferenceBlocks.text: There were lightnings, sounds, and thunders; and there was a great earthquake, such as was not since there were men on the earth, so great an earthquake, so mighty.

block.text: Na lait bilong klaut i sut i go nabaut na bikpela nois i kamap na klaut i pairap na bikpela guria i kamap. Dispela guria em i bikpela tru, na long olgeta taim ol manmeri i stap long graun, i no gat kain bikpela guria olsem i bin kamap bipo.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The great city was divided into three parts, and the cities of the nations fell. Babylon the great was remembered in the sight of God, to give to her the cup of the wine of the fierceness of his wrath.

block.text: Orait bikpela taun Babilon em i bruk tripela hap, na ol taun bilong olgeta lain man ol i bagarap olgeta. God i tingim pasin bilong bikpela taun Babilon, na em i mekim Babilon i dring long kap wain bilong em, em dispela wain bilong bikpela belhat tru bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Every island fled away, and the mountains were not found.

block.text: Na olgeta ailan ol i ranawe i go pinis, na i no gat wanpela maunten moa i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Great hailstones, about the weight of a talent, came down out of the sky on people. People blasphemed God because of the plague of the hail, for this plague is exceedingly severe.

block.text: Na bikpela ren ais i kam daun. Olgeta hap ais wan wan i gat hevi inap 50 kilogram samting. Dispela ren ais i kam long skai na i pundaun antap long ol man na bagarapim ol nogut tru. Olsem na ol i tok nogut long God i salim dispela ais i kam bagarapim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 17
One of the seven angels who had the seven bowls came and spoke with me, saying,

block.text: Wanpela bilong ol dispela 7 -pela ensel i holim ol 7 -pela dis, em i kam na i tokim mi olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Come here. I will show you the judgment of the great prostitute who sits on many waters.

block.text: "Yu kam. Dispela pamukmeri i sindaun antap long ol bikpela wara, em bai i kisim pe nogut bilong en. Mi laik soim yu long wanem kain pe em bai i kisim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: With her, the kings of the earth committed sexual immorality. Those who dwell in the earth were made drunken with the wine of her sexual immorality.”

block.text: Ol king bilong graun ol i bin mekim planti pasin pamuk wantaim dispela meri. Na olgeta man bilong graun ol tu i bin mekim pasin pamuk wantaim em, na ol i kamap longlong, olsem man i spak."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He carried me away in the Spirit into a wilderness. I saw a woman sitting on a scarlet-colored animal, full of blasphemous names, having seven heads and ten horns.

block.text: Na Holi Spirit i kamap strong long mi, na i karim mi i go long graun i no gat man. Long dispela hap mi lukim wanpela meri i sindaun i stap antap long wanpela retpela wel animal. Dispela wel animal i gat planti nem i pulap long skin bilong en, na olgeta dispela nem i olsem ol kain kain tok bilas na tok nogut long God. Dispela wel animal i gat 7 -pela het, na 10 -pela kom i kamap long ol dispela het.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The woman was dressed in purple and scarlet, and decked with gold and precious stones and pearls. She had in her hand a golden cup full of abominations and the impurities of the sexual immorality of the earth.

block.text: Dispela meri i putim tupela kain retpela klos, na em i gat ol kain kain bilas gol na ol bilas ol i bin wokim long ol naispela ston wantaim ol bis i dia tumas. Em i holim kap gol long han bilong en. Na ol kain kain pasin i sting tru long ai bilong God na ol kain kain doti bilong pasin pamuk bilong dispela meri, em olgeta i pulap long dispela kap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And on her forehead a name was written,

block.text: Na long pes bilong dispela meri ol i bin raitim nem bilong en. Dispela nem em i olsem wanpela tok bokis, na nem yet em i olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “MYSTERY, BABYLON THE GREAT, THE MOTHER OF THE PROSTITUTES AND OF THE ABOMINATIONS OF THE EARTH.”

block.text: "Bikpela taun Babilon, em mama tru bilong olgeta pamukmeri na bilong olgeta pasin nogut tru i stap long graun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw the woman drunken with the blood of the saints, and with the blood of the martyrs of Jesus. When I saw her, I wondered with great amazement.

block.text: Dispela meri em i bin kilim i dai ol manmeri bilong God, em ol manmeri i bilip long Jisas na i save autim nem bilong en. Na mi lukim dispela meri em i dringim blut bilong ol na em i kamap longlong olsem man i spak. Mi lukim dispela na mi kirap nogut tru na mi tingting planti.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The angel said to me,

block.text: Orait ensel i tokim mi olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why do you wonder? I will tell you the mystery of the woman, and of the beast that carries her, which has the seven heads and the ten horns.

block.text: "Bilong wanem yu kirap nogut? Dispela meri wantaim dispela wel animal em i save karim meri i go, em dispela wel animal i gat 7 -pela het na 1 -pela kom, tupela i olsem piksa bilong ol samting. As bilong dispela piksa em i hait, tasol mi bai soim yu long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The beast that you saw was, and is not; and is about to come up out of the abyss and to go into destruction. Those who dwell on the earth and whose names have not been written in the book of life from the foundation of the world will marvel when they see that the beast was, and is not, and shall be present.

block.text: Dispela wel animal yu lukim pinis, bipo em i stap, tasol nau em i no i stap moa. Tasol em bai i lusim dispela hul i no gat as, na em bai i kam antap, na em bai i lus olgeta. Ol manmeri bilong graun, em ol lain nem bilong ol i no i stap long buk bilong laip long taim God i no mekim graun i kamap yet, ol bai i lukim dispela wel animal na ol bai i kirap nogut. Long wanem, bipo em i stap, na nau em i no i stap, na bihain em bai i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Here is the mind that has wisdom. The seven heads are seven mountains, on which the woman sits.

block.text: "Man i gat gutpela tingting, em inap save gut long dispela samting. Dispela 7 -pela het i makim 7 -pela maunten. Na meri i sindaun antap long ol dispela 7 -pela maunten.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They are seven kings. Five have fallen, the one is, the other has not yet come. When he comes, he must continue a little while.

block.text: Na tu, dispela 7 -pela het i makim 7 -pela king. 5 -pela ol i bagarap pinis, na wanpela nau i stap, na wanpela i no kamap king yet. Taim em i kamap pinis, orait em i mas i stap liklik taim tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The beast that was, and is not, is himself also an eighth, and is of the seven; and he goes to destruction.

block.text: Na dispela wel animal bipo em i stap, na nau em i no i stap, em i olsem namba 8 king. Tasol em i wanlain bilong ol 7 -pela king, na em bai i lus olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The ten horns that you saw are ten kings who have received no kingdom as yet, but they receive authority as kings, with the beast, for one hour.

block.text: "Na dispela 10 -pela kom yu bin lukim i kamap long ol het bilong dispela wel animal, ol i makim 10 -pela king. Ol i no kamap king yet. Tasol ol bai i kisim strong wantaim dispela wel animal, na ol bai i stap king inap olsem wanpela aua tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These have one mind, and they give their power and authority to the beast.

block.text: Ol dispela king bai i gat wanpela tingting tasol, na ol bai i givim olgeta strong na namba bilong ol yet long wel animal.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These will war against the Lamb, and the Lamb will overcome them, for he is Lord of lords, and King of kings. They also will overcome who are with him, called and chosen and faithful.”

block.text: Ol bai i pait long Pikinini Sipsip, na Pikinini Sipsip bai i winim ol tru. Em i Bikpela bilong olgeta bikman, na em i King bilong olgeta king. Na olgeta man i stap wantaim em, em ol lain em i bin singautim ol na em i bin makim ol bilong em yet na ol i save bihainim tru tok bilong em, ol dispela man bai i win wantaim Pikinini Sipsip long dispela pait."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to me,

block.text: Na ensel i tokim mi moa olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The waters which you saw, where the prostitute sits, are peoples, multitudes, nations, and languages.

block.text: "Ol dispela bikpela wara yu bin lukim pamukmeri i sindaun antap long ol, ol i makim ol manmeri bilong olgeta lain man na bilong olgeta kain skin na bilong olgeta tok ples na bilong ol bikpela bikpela lain ol i bung i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The ten horns which you saw, and the beast, these will hate the prostitute. They will make her desolate, and will make her naked, and will eat her flesh, and will burn her utterly with fire.

block.text: Na ol dispela 10 -pela kom yu bin lukim, ol dispela kom wantaim dispela wel animal ol bai i birua long pamukmeri. Ol bai i bagarapim em tru na rausim olgeta klos samting bilong en. Na ol bai i kaikai mit bilong bodi bilong en, na kukim em olgeta long paia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For God has put in their hearts to do what he has in mind. To be of one mind, and to give their kingdom to the beast, until the words of God should be accomplished.

block.text: God yet i givim tingting long ol dispela king, bai ol i ken mekim ol dispela samting i kamap, em ol samting bipo God i tok pinis long ol i mas kamap. Ol bai i gat wanpela tingting tasol, na dispela strong ol i kisim bilong i stap king, ol bai i givim dispela olgeta long wel animal. Ol bai i mekim olsem i go inap long taim God inapim pinis olgeta samting em i bin tok long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The woman whom you saw is the great city, which reigns over the kings of the earth.”

block.text: Na dispela meri yu bin lukim, em i makim dispela bikpela taun i save bosim olgeta king bilong graun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 18
After these things, I saw another angel coming down out of the sky, having great authority. The earth was illuminated with his glory.

block.text: Bihain long dispela, mi lukim narapela ensel i lusim heven na i kam daun. Em i gat bikpela strong tru, na bilas bilong en i mekim graun i lait moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He cried with a mighty voice, saying,

block.text: Em i singaut strong tru olsem,

block.characterId: angel, another, coming down from heaven

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: angel, another, coming down from heaven
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Fallen, fallen is Babylon the great! She has become a habitation of demons, a prison of every unclean spirit, and a prison of every unclean and hateful bird!

block.text: "Bikpela taun Babilon em i bagarap pinis! Em i bagarap pinis! Nau em i kamap ples bilong ol spirit nogut i stap long en. Ol spirit nogut, na ol pisin i doti, na ol pisin nogut tru,
ol tu i stap long en.

block.characterId: angel, another, coming down from heaven

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: angel, another, coming down from heaven
ReferenceBlocks.text: For all the nations have drunk of the wine of the wrath of her sexual immorality. The kings of the earth committed sexual immorality with her, and the merchants of the earth grew rich from the abundance of her luxury.”

block.text: Long wanem, olgeta lain manmeri i bin mekim planti pasin pamuk wantaim em. I olsem ol i bin dringim strongpela wain bilong em. Na ol king bilong graun tu i bin mekim pasin pamuk wantaim em. Na ol man bilong graun i save wok bisnis, ol i bin wokim bisnis na kisim planti mani long ol kain kain pasin nogut em i no save sem long mekim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: I heard another voice from heaven, saying,

block.text: Na mi harim maus bilong narapela man i kamap long heven olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Come out of her, my people, that you have no participation in her sins, and that you don’t receive of her plagues,

block.text: "Yupela ol manmeri bilong mi, yupela i mas lusim dispela ples na i kam ausait. Nogut yupela i poroman wantaim em long ol sin em i save mekim. Na nogut yupela bai i poroman wantaim em tu long taim em i kisim pe nogut bilong ol dispela sin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: for her sins have reached to the sky, and God has remembered her iniquities.

block.text: Em i hipim ol sin bilong en i kam antap inap long heven. Na God i tingim gut olgeta pasin nogut em i bin mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Return to her just as she returned, and repay her double as she did, and according to her works. In the cup which she mixed, mix to her double.

block.text: Yupela i mas ting long kain pasin dispela pamukmeri i mekim, na yupela i mas bekim wankain pasin long em. Em i bin dabolim ol pasin nogut bilong en na ol i kamap planti tru. Olsem tasol yupela i mas dabolim pe nogut bilong em inap long olgeta pasin nogut em i bin mekim. Em i bin tanim strongpela dring long kap. Orait yupela i mas dabolim strong bilong strongpela dring na mekim em i dring.

ReferenceBlocks.text: However much she glorified herself, and grew wanton, so much give her of torment and mourning. For she says in her heart,

block.text: Em i bin litimapim nem bilong em yet na mekim planti kain pasin pamuk na ol arapela kain pasin nogut. Olsem na yupela i mas givim planti pen long em, inap long skel bilong ol dispela pasin nogut. Na yupela i mas mekim em i krai planti. Em i save tok long em yet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: ‘I sit as queen, and am no widow, and will in no way see mourning.’

block.text: ‘Mi stap kwin, na mi sindaun long sia kwin. Mi no olsem meri man bilong en i dai pinis na em i stap nating. Ol hevi i no inap i kamap long mi, na bai mi krai. Nogat tru.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore in one day her plagues will come:
death, mourning, and famine; and she will be utterly burned with fire; for the Lord God who has judged her is strong."

block.text: Olsem na ol kain kain samting nogut tru bai i kamap long em long wanpela de tasol.

Planti sik bai i kamap, na planti man bai i krai nogut, na bikpela hangre bai i kamap. Na paia bai i kukim Babilon olgeta. God, Bikpela em i gat bikpela strong na em i skelim pinis pasin bilong Babilon na em tok long em i mas bagarap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The kings of the earth, who committed sexual immorality and lived wantonly with her, will weep and wail over her, when they look at the
smoke of her burning,

block.text: "Ol king bilong graun ol i bin mekim pasin pamuk wantaim em, na ol i bin mekim planti kain pasin nogut wantaim em. Olsem na taim ol dispela king i lukim
smok i kamap long paia i kukim em, ol bai i krai sori na i stap bel hevi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: standing far away for the fear of her torment, saying,

block.text: Ol bai i lukim dispela pen nogut em i kisim, na ol bai i pret tru. Ol bai i sanap longwe long em na tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Woe, woe, the great city, Babylon, the strong city! For your judgment has come in one hour.”

block.text: ‘Sori, sori tumas long yu Babilon, yu bikpela na strongpela taun! Long wanpela aua tasol pe nogut bilong sin bilong yu em i kamap pinis long yu!'

ReferenceBlocks.text: The merchants of the earth weep and mourn over her, for no one buys their merchandise any more;

block.text: "Na ol bisnisman bilong olgeta hap bilong graun ol bai i tingting long Babilon, na ol bai i krai sori long em na i stap bel hevi. Long wanem, i no gat man bilong baim ol kago bilong ol moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: merchandise of gold, silver, precious stones, pearls, fine linen, purple, silk, scarlet, all expensive wood, every vessel of ivory, every vessel made of most precious wood, and of brass, and iron, and marble;

block.text: Ol kago bilong ol, em gol na silva na ol naispela ston na ol bis i dia tumas na ol naispela waitpela laplap na ol kain kain retpela laplap na ol laplap slika. Na tu ol i gat olgeta kain diwai i gat gutpela smel na olkain samting ol i wokim long tit bilong elefan na olkain samting ol i wokim long diwai i gat bikpela pe bilong en na long bras na long ain na long gutpela ston i gat makmak.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and cinnamon, incense, perfume, frankincense, wine, olive oil, fine flour, wheat, sheep, horses, chariots, and people’s bodies and souls.

block.text: Na ol i gat ol arapela kago tu i stap, olsem sinamon na kawawar bilong kaikai na paura bilong kamapim smok i gat gutpela smel na ol kain kain gris i gat gutpela smel na gutpela sanda na wain na wel na gutpela plaua na wit. Na ol i gat ol bulmakau na sipsip na ol hos wantaim ol karis na ol wokboi nating, em ol man i gat laip. Dispela olgeta samting i no gat man bilong baim moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They cried out to the city:

block.text: Ol man i save wok bisnis ol bai i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The fruits which your soul lusted after have been lost to you. All things that were dainty and sumptuous have perished from you, and you will find them no more at all.”

block.text: 'Dispela kaikai bel bilong yu i bin kirap long kisim, em olgeta i stap longwe tru long yu. Olgeta gutpela gutpela samting i gat bikpela pe wantaim olgeta gutpela gutpela bilas bilong yu, em olgeta i lus pinis, na bai yu no inap tru long lukim gen.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: The merchants of these things, who were made rich by her, will stand far away for the fear of her torment, weeping and mourning;
saying,

block.text: "Na ol man i save wok bisnis long ol dispela samting, na ol i bin kisim planti mani long dispela taun, ol bai i pret tru long lukim pen nogut dispela taun em i kisim. Na ol bai i sanap i stap longwe long en, na ol bai i krai sori na i stap bel hevi.
Ol bai i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Woe, woe, the great city, she who was dressed in fine linen, purple, and scarlet, and decked with gold and precious stones and pearls!

block.text: ‘Sori, sori tumas long dispela bikpela taun! Bipo em i save putim ol naispela waitpela klos na ol kain kain retpela laplap, na em i save bilasim skin bilong en long gol na long ol naispela ston wantaim ol bis i dia tumas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For in an hour such great riches are made desolate.

block.text: Long wanpela aua tasol, dispela olgeta mani na bilas em i bagarap olgeta.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: Every shipmaster, and everyone who sails anywhere, and mariners, and as many as gain their living by sea, stood far away,”
and cried out as they looked at the smoke of her burning, saying,

block.text: "Na olgeta kepten bilong ol sip na olgeta man i save raun long ol sip na i go long ol arapela kantri na olgeta boskru na olgeta man i save wok bisnis long solwara, ol dispela man tu bai i sanap i stap longwe long Babilon.
Na ol bai i lukim smok bilong paia i kukim em, na ol bai i singaut olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What is like the great city?”

block.text: ‘Wanem taun i stap na em i wankain olsem dispela bikpela taun?'

ReferenceBlocks.text: They cast dust on their heads, and cried, weeping and mourning, saying,

block.text: Na ol bai i kisim das bilong graun na tromoi antap long het bilong ol yet, na ol bai i krai sori na bel hevi i stap. Na ol bai i singaut olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Woe, woe, the great city, in which all who had their ships in the sea were made rich by reason of her great wealth! For in one hour is she made desolate.”

block.text: ‘Sori, sori tumas long dispela bikpela taun! Ol papa bilong olgeta sip i save raun long solwara ol i bin kamap maniman tru long bikpela mani bilong dispela taun. Sori tumas! Long wanpela aua tasol em i bagarap olgeta!'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Rejoice over her, O heaven, you saints, apostles, and prophets; for God has judged your judgment on her.”

block.text: "Yu heven wantaim ol manmeri bilong God, na yupela ol aposel na profet, yupela olgeta i ken amamas long dispela samting nau i kamap long dispela taun. God i skelim pinis pasin bilong em na em i bekim pe nogut long em. Na long dispela pasin em i bekim ol pasin nogut dispela taun i bin mekim long yupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: A mighty angel took up a stone like a great millstone and cast it into the sea, saying,

block.text: Dispela tok i pinis, na wanpela strongpela ensel i kisim wanpela ston i wankain mak olsem ol bikpela ston bilong wilwilim wit. Em i litimapim dispela ston na i tromoi i go daun long solwara. Na em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Thus with violence will Babylon, the great city, be thrown down, and will be found no more at all.

block.text: "Long dispela pasin tasol ol bai i kisim dispela bikpela taun Babilon na tromoi i go daun strong tru, na ol man bai i no inap lukim em moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The voice of harpists, minstrels, flute players, and trumpeters will be heard no more at all in you. No craftsman, of whatever craft, will be found any more at all in you. The sound of a mill will be heard no more at all in you.

block.text: Olsem na, Babilon, krai bilong ol gita na bilong ol mambu na biugel na bilong ol kain kain musik, em bai i no kamap moa insait long banis bilong yu. Na ol man i skul pinis long mekim olgeta kain wok, ol bai i no i stap moa long yu. Krai bilong ston i wilwilim wit, em bai i no kamap moa insait long yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The light of a lamp will shine no more at all in you. The voice of the bridegroom and of the bride will be heard no more at all in you; for your merchants were the princes of the earth; for with your sorcery all the nations were deceived.

block.text: Lait bilong lam, em bai i no lait moa long yu. Na toktok bilong ol man na meri i laik marit, em tu bai i no inap kamap moa insait long yu. Bipo ol bisnisman bilong yu ol i stap bikman tru long ai bilong ol arapela lain manmeri. Na yu bin wokim ol kain kain posin samting bilong giamanim ol manmeri bilong olgeta kantri."

ReferenceBlocks.text: In her was found the blood of prophets and of saints, and of all who have been slain on the earth.”

block.text: God i lukim dispela taun i gat asua bilong kilim i dai ol profet na ol manmeri bilong en. Na olgeta man bilong graun ol birua i bin kilim ol i dai, asua bilong dispela tu em i stap long Babilon tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 19
After these things I heard something like a loud voice of a great multitude in heaven, saying,

block.text: Bihain long dispela, mi harim samting olsem bikpela singaut bilong bikpela lain manmeri i stap long heven. Ol i tok olsem,

block.characterId: voice of great crowd in heaven, loud

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: voice of great crowd in heaven, loud
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Hallelujah! Salvation, power, and glory belong to our God:

block.text: "Yumi litimapim nem bilong God! God bilong yumi em wanpela tasol i bin kisim bek yumi. Em i gat biknem na strong.

block.characterId: voice of great crowd in heaven, loud

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: voice of great crowd in heaven, loud
ReferenceBlocks.text: for true and righteous are his judgments. For he has judged the great prostitute, who corrupted the earth with her sexual immorality, and he has avenged the blood of his servants at her hand.”

block.text: God i save skelim pasin bilong ol manmeri long kot, na kot bilong en em i tru na i stret olgeta. Dispela bikpela pamukmeri em i bin bagarapim olgeta manmeri bilong graun long pasin pamuk bilong en. Olsem na God i bekim pe nogut long em. Dispela meri em i gat asua bilong kilim i dai ol wokman bilong God, na God i bekim pinis dispela asua bilong em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: A second said,

block.text: Na ol i singaut gen olsem,

block.characterId: voice of great crowd in heaven, loud

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: voice of great crowd in heaven, loud
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Hallelujah! Her smoke goes up forever and ever.”

block.text: "Yumi litimapim nem bilong God! Smok bilong paia i kukim dispela biktaun, em i save go antap oltaim oltaim!"

ReferenceBlocks.text: The twenty-four elders and the four living creatures fell down and worshiped God who sits on the throne, saying,

block.text: Na ol 24 hetman wantaim ol 4 -pela samting i stap laip ol i brukim skru na lotu long God i sindaun i stap long sia king bilong en. Ol i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Amen! Hallelujah!”

block.text: "I tru. Yumi litimapim nem bilong God!"

ReferenceBlocks.text: A voice came forth from the throne, saying,

block.text: Na long sia king bilong God maus bilong wanpela man i singaut olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Give praise to our God, all you his servants, you who fear him, the small and the great!”

block.text: "Yupela wokman bilong God, em yupela ol lain i save pret long God na aninit long en, yupela ol man nating wantaim yupela ol man i gat nem, yupela olgeta litimapim nem bilong God!"

ReferenceBlocks.text: I heard something like the voice of a great multitude, and like the voice of many waters, and like the voice of mighty thunders, saying,

block.text: Orait mi harim samting olsem toktok bilong ol bikpela lain manmeri i bung i stap. Na em i olsem nois bilong bikpela wara i pairap. Na em i olsem ol klaut i wok long pairap strong tru. Ol i singaut olsem,

block.characterId: voice of great crowd, like roar of many waters, loud thunderclaps

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: voice of great crowd, like roar of many waters, loud thunderclaps
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Hallelujah! For the Lord our God, the Almighty, reigns!

block.text: "Yumi litimapim nem bilong God! Bikpela, em God I Gat Olgeta Strong, nau em i stap king tru!

block.characterId: voice of great crowd, like roar of many waters, loud thunderclaps

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: voice of great crowd, like roar of many waters, loud thunderclaps
ReferenceBlocks.text: Let us rejoice and be exceedingly glad, and let us give the glory to him. For the marriage of the Lamb has come, and his wife has made herself ready.”

block.text: Nau yumi ken belgut na amamas moa yet na litimapim nem bilong en, long wanem, taim i kamap pinis bilong Pikinini Sipsip i marit, na meri bilong en i redi i stap.

block.characterId: voice of great crowd, like roar of many waters, loud thunderclaps

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: voice of great crowd, like roar of many waters, loud thunderclaps
ReferenceBlocks.text: “It was given to her that she would array herself in bright, pure, fine linen.”

block.text: God i givim naispela waitpela klos long dispela meri, em klos i klin tru na i lait moa yet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: (For the fine linen is the righteous acts of the saints.)
He said to me,

block.text: Dispela naispela waitpela klos em i makim stretpela pasin ol manmeri bilong God i mekim.
Na ensel i tokim mi olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Write, Blessed are those who are invited to the marriage supper of the Lamb.”

block.text: "Yu raitim tok olsem, 'Ol dispela man God i bin singautim i kam long bikpela kaikai bilong marit bilong Pikinini Sipsip, ol i ken amamas.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to me,

block.text: Na em i tokim mi moa olsem

ReferenceBlocks.text: “These are true words of God.”

block.text: "Dispela tok em i tok tru bilong God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: I fell down before his feet to worship him. He said to me,

block.text: Orait mi brukim skru klostu long lek bilong ensel, na mi laik lotu long em. Tasol em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Look! Don’t do it! I am a fellow bondservant with you and with your brothers who hold the testimony of Jesus. Worship God, for the testimony of Jesus is the Spirit of Prophecy.”

block.text: "Yu no ken mekim olsem! Mi tu mi wanwok bilong yu wantaim ol brata bilong yu, em yupela ol lain i save bilip long tok Jisas i autim. Yu mas lotu long God wanpela tasol. Yumi save, tok Jisas i autim, em tasol i save kirapim ol man long autim tok profet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw the heaven opened, and behold, a white horse, and he who sat on it is called Faithful and True. In righteousness he judges and makes war.

block.text: Mi lukim heven i op, na wanpela waitpela hos i stap. Na nem bilong man i sindaun long dispela hos, em i olsem, "Man i lukautim gut wok bilong en," na "Man i save mekim pasin i tru tasol." Taim em i skelim pasin bilong ol manmeri long kot, na taim em i kirapim pait, em i save bihainim stretpela pasin tasol na mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His eyes are a flame of fire, and on his head are many crowns. He has names written and a name written which no one knows but he himself.

block.text: Ai bilong en i olsem paia i lait, na em i gat planti hat king i stap long het bilong en. Long skin bilong en ol i bin raitim wanpela nem, na em wanpela tasol i save long dispela nem. Ol arapela man nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He is clothed in a garment sprinkled with blood. His name is called “The Word of God.”

block.text: Blut i karamapim longpela klos em i putim. Na ol i kolim nem bilong en olsem, "Tok bilong God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The armies which are in heaven followed him on white horses, clothed in white, pure, fine linen.

block.text: Ol ami bilong heven ol i sindaun long ol waitpela hos bilong ol, na ol i bihainim em i go. Ol i bin putim ol naispela waitpela klos samting i klin tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Out of his mouth proceeds a sharp, double-edged sword, that with it he should strike the nations. He will rule them with an iron rod. He treads the winepress of the fierceness of the wrath of God, the Almighty.

block.text: Wanpela bainat i sap tru, em i kam ausait long maus bilong dispela man i go pas long ol. Na long dispela bainat em bai i daunim ol manmeri bilong olgeta lain. Em bai i holim stik ain na bosim strong olgeta lain manmeri. Na em bai i krungutim ol pikinini wain long bikpela tang ston i makim bikpela belhat bilong God I Gat Olgeta Strong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He has on his garment and on his thigh a name written,

block.text: Long longpela klos bilong en na long lek bilong en ol i bin raitim dispela nem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “KING OF KINGS, AND LORD OF LORDS.”

block.text: "King bilong olgeta king, na Bikpela bilong olgeta bikman."

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw an angel standing in the sun. He cried with a loud voice, saying to all the birds that fly in the sky,

block.text: Orait mi lukim wanpela ensel i sanap antap long san. Em i singaut strong long olgeta pisin i flai i stap namel long skai olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Come! Be gathered together to the great supper of God,

block.text: "Yupela kam bung na wetim dispela bikpela kaikai bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: that you may eat the flesh of kings, the flesh of captains, the flesh of mighty men, and the flesh of horses and of those who sit on them, and the flesh of all men, both free and slave, and small and great.”

block.text: Bai yupela i kaikai ol bodi bilong ol king na ol bodi bilong ol kepten bilong ol soldia na ol bodi bilong ol strongpela man na ol bodi bilong ol hos wantaim ol man i sindaun long ol hos. Bai yupela i kaikai mit bilong bodi bilong olgeta man, em ol man i stap fri wantaim ol wokboi nating na ol man nating wantaim ol man i gat nem."

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw the beast, and the kings of the earth, and their armies, gathered together to make war against him who sat on the horse, and against his army.

block.text: Na mi lukim dispela wel animal na ol king bilong graun, wantaim ol ami bilong ol, ol i kam bung pinis. Ol i laik pait long dispela man i sindaun long hos na long ol ami bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The beast was taken, and with him the false prophet who worked the signs in his sight, with which he deceived those who had received the mark of the beast and those who worshiped his image.
These two were thrown alive into the lake of fire that burns with sulfur.

block.text: Tasol em i kalabusim dispela wel animal wantaim giaman profet, em dispela giaman profet i bin wokim planti mirakel long ai bilong wel animal, na long dispela pasin em i bin giamanim ol man i bin kisim mak bilong wel animal na i save lotu long piksa bilong en. Wel animal wantaim giaman profet,
tupela i stap laip yet, na ol i tromoi tupela i go daun long dispela bikpela raunpela hul ol ston salfa i pulap long en na ol i paia i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The rest were killed with the sword of him who sat on the horse, the sword which came forth out of his mouth. All the birds were filled with their flesh.

block.text: Na dispela man i sindaun long hos, em i kilim i dai ol ami bilong ol long dispela bainat i stap long maus bilong en. Na olgeta pisin i kaikai bodi bilong ol dispela ami, na bel bilong ol i pulap tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 20
I saw an angel coming down out of heaven, having the key of the abyss and a great chain in his hand.

block.text: Orait mi lukim wanpela ensel i lusim heven na i kam daun. Long han bilong en em i holim ki bilong hul i no gat as. Na em i holim bikpela sen tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He seized the dragon, the old serpent, which is the devil and Satan, who deceives the whole inhabited earth, and bound him for a thousand years.

block.text: Em i holimpas dispela bikpela snek, em snek bilong bipo tru, em Satan, dispela "Man I Save Kotim Olgeta Man." Na ensel i pasim em long sen na em bai i stap olsem inap long 1,000 yia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And he cast him into the abyss, and shut it, and sealed it over him, that he should deceive the nations no more, until the thousand years were finished. After this, he must be freed for a short time.

block.text: Na ensel i tromoi em i go daun long hul i no gat as, na i pasim dua bilong dispela hul na i lokim strong. Olsem na Satan bai i no inap giamanim moa ol manmeri bilong olgeta lain. Em i mas wetim 1,000 yia i pinis pastaim, na bihain ol i mas lusim em, na long sotpela taim tasol em i ken i go nabaut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw thrones, and they sat on them, and judgment was given to them. I saw the souls of those who had been beheaded for the testimony of Jesus, and for the word of God, and such as didn’t worship the beast nor his image, and didn’t receive the mark on their forehead and on their hand. They lived, and reigned with Christ for a thousand years.

block.text: Na mi lukim ol sia olsem sia king i stap, na ol man i sindaun i stap long ol dispela sia. God i givim wok long ol bilong skelim pasin bilong ol manmeri long kot. Na mi lukim ol tewel bilong planti manmeri i bin bilip long Jisas na autim nem bilong en na ol i bin holim strong tok bilong God, na long dispela as tasol ol birua i bin katim nek bilong ol na kilim ol i dai. Na mi lukim ol tewel bilong ol manmeri i no bin lotu long wel animal na long piksa bilong en, na ol i no bin kisim mak bilong en long pes na long han bilong ol. Ol dispela manmeri ol i kisim laip, na ol i stap king wantaim Krais inap long 1,000 yia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The rest of the dead didn’t live until the thousand years were finished. This is the first resurrection.

block.text: Ol arapela manmeri i dai pinis, ol i no kisim laip long dispela taim. Ol i mas wetim dispela 1,000 yia i pinis pastaim. Dispela em i namba wan taim ol manmeri i kirap bek long matmat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Blessed and holy is he who has part in the first resurrection. Over these, the second death has no power, but they will be priests of God and of Christ, and will reign with him one thousand years.

block.text: Ol manmeri i kirap bek long dispela namba wan taim, God i makim ol bilong em yet na ol i ken amamas. Namba 2 dai em i no gat strong bilong daunim ol dispela lain. Nogat. Ol bai i stap pris bilong God na bilong Krais. Na ol bai i stap king wantaim Krais long dispela 1,000 yia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And after the thousand years, Satan will be released from his prison,

block.text: Taim dispela 1,000 yia i pinis, orait ol bai i opim dua bilong hul i no gat as, na Satan bai i lusim kalabus bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and he will come out to deceive the nations which are in the four corners of the earth, Gog and Magog, to gather them together to the war; the number of whom is as the sand of the sea.

block.text: Na em bai i kam ausait bilong giamanim ol lain manmeri i stap long olgeta hap bilong graun, em ol lain bilong Gok wantaim Magok. Satan bai i bungim ol bilong kirapim pait. Namba bilong ol ami bilong ol em i olsem namba bilong wesan bilong nambis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They went up over the breadth of the earth, and surrounded the camp of the saints, and the beloved city. Fire came down out of heaven from God, and devoured them.

block.text: Ol bai i kam long olgeta hap bilong graun, na raunim kem bilong ol manmeri bilong God wantaim dispela taun God i laikim tumas. Tasol paia bai i kam daun long heven na kukim tru ol dispela ami.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The devil who deceived them was thrown into the lake of fire and sulfur, where the beast and the false prophet are also. They will be tormented day and night forever and ever.

block.text: Satan i bin giamanim ol, olsem na God bai i tromoi em i go daun long bikpela hul i gat hatpela paia bilong ol ston salfa. Wel animal wantaim giaman profet tupela i stap pinis long dispela hul, na tripela bai i karim pen long san na long nait inap oltaim oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw a great white throne, and him who sat on it, from whose face the earth and the heaven fled away. There was found no place for them.

block.text: Orait mi lukim bikpela waitpela sia king i stap, na mi lukim dispela man i save sindaun long dispela sia.
Na graun wantaim skai i ranawe long em, na ol i no i stap moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw the dead, the great and the small, standing before the God, and they opened books. Another book was opened, which is the book of life. The dead were judged out of the things which were written in the books, according to their works.

block.text: Na mi lukim ol manmeri i dai pinis, em ol manmeri i gat nem na ol manmeri nating, ol i sanap i stap long pes bilong sia king. Na ol ensel i opim ol buk i gat tok long pasin ol dispela manmeri i bin mekim. Na ol i opim narapela buk tu, em buk bilong laip. Na man i sindaun long sia king i lukim tok i stap long ol dispela buk, na em i skelim pasin bilong ol manmeri i dai pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The sea gave up the dead who were in it. Death and Hades gave up the dead who were in them. They were judged, each one according to his works.

block.text: Solwara i larim olgeta man i dai pinis na i stap long en, ol i go. Na Dai wantaim Ples bilong ol man i dai pinis, tupela tu i larim olgeta man i dai pinis na i stap long han bilong tupela, ol i go. Na man i sindaun long sia king em i lukim pasin olgeta wan wan man i bin mekim, na em i skelim ol long kot bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Death and Hades were thrown into the lake of fire. The lake of fire
is the second death.

block.text: Na bihain em i tromoi Dai wantaim Ples bilong ol man i dai pinis i go daun long dispela bikpela hul i gat paia. Dispela bikpela hul i gat paia em i namba 2 dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone was not found written in the book of life, he was cast into the lake of fire.

block.text: Na olgeta manmeri, nem bilong ol i no i stap long buk bilong laip, ol i tromoi ol tu i go daun long bikpela hul i gat paia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 21
I saw a new heaven and a new earth: for the first heaven and the first earth have passed away, and the sea is no more.

block.text: Nau mi lukim nupela skai na nupela graun i stap. Namba wan skai na namba wan graun i go pinis olgeta. Na solwara i no i stap moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw the holy city, New Jerusalem, coming down out of heaven from God, prepared like a bride adorned for her husband.

block.text: Na mi lukim dispela taun bilong God, em nupela Jerusalem. Mi lukim em i stap wantaim God, na i lusim heven na i kam daun. Em i gat gutpela bilas, olsem meri i laik marit na i putim gutpela bilas na i redi long maritim man bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I heard a loud voice out of heaven saying,

block.text: Na long sia king mi harim maus bilong wanpela man i singaut strong olsem

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, God’s dwelling is with people, and he will dwell with them, and they will be his people, and God himself will be with them as their God.

block.text: "Harim. Nau haus bilong God i stap wantaim ol manmeri. Em bai i stap namel long ol, na ol bai i stap ol lain manmeri bilong em. Yes, God yet bai i stap wantaim ol, na em bai i stap God bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will wipe away from them every tear from their eyes. Death will be no more; neither will there be mourning, nor crying, nor pain, any more. The first things have passed away.”

block.text: Em bai i mekim drai wara i stap long ai bilong olgeta bilong ol. Na ol manmeri bai i no i dai moa, na ol bai i no bel hevi moa na krai moa, na ol bai i no inap kisim pen gen. Ol dispela samting bilong bipo ol i pinis olgeta."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who sits on the throne said,

block.text: Na dispela Man i sindaun long sia king, em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, I am making all things new.”

block.text: "Harim. Mi mekim olgeta samting i kamap nupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said,

block.text: Na em i tok moa olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Write, for these words are faithful and true.”

block.text: "Yu raitim dispela tok. Dispela tok em i tru olgeta, inap olgeta man i ken bilip tru long en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to me,

block.text: Na em i tokim mi olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is done! I am the Alpha and the Omega, the Beginning and the End. I will give freely to him who is thirsty from the spring of the water of life.

block.text: "Olgeta samting i kamap pinis. Mi tasol mi stap paslain tru na mi stap las tru. Mi as bilong olgeta samting, na mi save pinisim olgeta wok mi mekim. Sapos nek bilong wanpela man i drai, orait mi bai larim em i dring long hul wara i gat wara bilong laip. Na mi bai larim em i kisim olsem presen. Em i no mas baim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who overcomes, I will give him these things. I will be his God, and he will be my son.

block.text: Sapos man i winim pait, orait mi bai givim ol dispela samting long em, na mi bai stap God bilong em, na em bai i stap pikinini bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But for the cowardly, unbelieving, sinners, abominable, murderers, sexually immoral, sorcerers, idolaters, and all liars, their part is in the lake that burns with fire and sulfur, which is the second death.”

block.text: "Tasol ol man i save pret na surik bek na ol man i no bilip na ol man i mekim ol kain kain pasin nogut tru na ol man i kilim ol man i dai na ol man i mekim pasin pamuk na ol man i wokim posin na i yusim ol arapela kain pawa na ol man i lotu long ol giaman god na olgeta man i mekim tok giaman, ol bai i go long ples bilong ol, em dispela bikpela hul i gat hatpela paia i lait long ol ston salfa. Dispela em i namba 2 dai."
