ReferenceBlocks.text: One of the seven angels who had the seven bowls, who were loaded with the seven last plagues came, and he spoke to me, saying,

block.text: Orait wanpela ensel i kam long mi. Em i wanpela bilong ol 7 -pela ensel i holim ol dis i gat dispela 7 -pela samting nogut bilong bagarapim ol manmeri na bilong pinisim belhat bilong God. Na ensel i tokim mi olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Come here. I will show you the bride, the wife of the Lamb.”

block.text: "Yu kam. Bai mi soim yu meri bilong Pikinini Sipsip, nau em i laik marit long em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He carried me away in the Spirit to a great and high mountain, and showed me the holy city, Jerusalem, coming down out of heaven from God.

block.text: Na Holi Spirit i kamap strong long mi, na ensel i karim mi i go long wanpela bikpela maunten i antap moa.
Na em i soim mi Jerusalem, dispela taun bilong God, em i stap wantaim God, na em i lusim heven na i kam daun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It shone with the glory of God and its light was like a most precious stone, as if it were a jasper stone, clear as crystal.

block.text: Bikpela lait bilong God em i lait long dispela taun. Lait bilong en i narakain tru, olsem gutpela ston i gat bikpela pe moa. Em i lait olsem ston jaspa, na em i klia tru olsem glas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It had a great and high wall with twelve gates, and at the gates twelve angels. On the gates were written the names of the twelve tribes of the children of Israel.

block.text: Dispela taun i gat bikpela banis i antap moa. Em i gat 12 -pela dua i stap long banis, na 12 -pela ensel ol i sanap i stap klostu long ol dua. Na nem bilong ol 12 -pela lain bilong Israel i stap long ol dua.

ReferenceBlocks.text: On the east were three gates; and on the north three gates; and on the south three gates; and on the west three gates.

block.text: Dispela hap bilong banis i stap long hap sankamap em i gat tripela dua. Na hap bilong banis i stap long hap not em i gat tripela dua. Na hap bilong banis i stap long hap saut em i gat tripela dua. Na hap bilong banis i stap long hap san i go daun em i gat tripela dua.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The wall of the city had twelve foundations, and on them twelve names of the twelve Apostles of the Lamb.

block.text: Dispela banis bilong taun em i gat 12 -pela ston bilong strongim as bilong en, na nem bilong ol 12 -pela aposel bilong Pikinini Sipsip i stap long ol dispela ston.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who spoke with me had for a measure, a golden reed, to measure the city, its gates, and its walls.

block.text: Dispela ensel i toktok wantaim mi, em i holim stik gol bilong metaim dispela taun wantaim bikpela banis bilong en na ol dua bilong dispela banis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The city lies foursquare, and its length is as great as its breadth. He measured the city with the reed, Twelve thousand twelve stadia. Its length, breadth, and height are equal.

block.text: Ol 4 -pela sait bilong dispela biktaun i gat wankain mak tasol. Longpela bilong en na bikpela bilong en ol i gat wankain mak stret. Ensel i metaim taun long stik bilong en, na mak bilong taun em inap long 2,200 kilomita. Ol 4 -pela sait bilong taun na mak bilong antap bilong taun tu, olgeta i gat wankain mak stret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Its wall is one hundred forty-four cubits, by the measure of a man, that is, of an angel.

block.text: Em i metaim banis bilong taun tu, na banis i go insait inap long 144 meta. Dispela meta em i kain meta ol man i save metaim ol samting long en. Na ensel i metaim banis long dispela meta tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The construction of its wall was jasper. The city was pure gold, like pure glass.

block.text: Banis bilong taun em God i bin wokim long ston jaspa. Na em i wokim taun yet long gol tasol, na taun i lait olsem glas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The foundations of the city’s wall were adorned with all kinds of precious stones. The first foundation was jasper; the second, sapphire; the third, chalcedony; the fourth, emerald;

block.text: As bilong banis bilong taun, em God i bin bilasim long ol kain kain ston i gat bikpela pe. Namba wan naispela ston long as bilong banis em jaspa. Na namba 2 em blupela ston sapaia. Na namba 3 em ston aget. Na namba 4 em grinpela ston emeral.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the fifth, sardonyx; the sixth, sardius; the seventh, chrysolite; the eighth, beryl; the ninth, topaz; the tenth, chrysoprasus; the eleventh, jacinth; and the twelfth, amethyst.

block.text: Na namba 5 em ston sadonikis, em i ret na wait wantaim. Na namba 6 em retpela ston konilian. Na namba 7 em yelopela ston krisolait. Namba 8 em narapela kain grinpela ston beril. Namba 9 em narapela kain yelopela ston topas. Na namba 10 em ston krisopres. Namba 11 em ston haiasin. Na namba 12 em narapela kain retpela ston ametis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The twelve gates were twelve pearls. Each one of the gates was made of one pearl. The street of the city was pure gold, like transparent glass.

block.text: Dispela 12 -pela dua em 12 -pela pel, em ol dispela kain waitpela bis i dia tumas. Ol wan wan dua ol i wokim long wanpela wanpela bikpela pel tasol. Olgeta rot bilong taun ol i wokim long gol tasol, na dispela gol em i klia tru olsem glas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw no temple in it, for the Lord God, the Almighty, and the Lamb, are its temple.

block.text: Mi no lukim wanpela tempel i stap long dispela taun. Nogat. Bikpela, em God I Gat Olgeta Strong, wantaim Pikinini Sipsip, tupela yet i stap olsem tempel bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The city has no need for the sun, neither of the moon, to shine, for the very glory of God illuminated it, and its lamp is the Lamb.

block.text: Na dispela taun i no gat san na mun bilong givim lait. Nogat. Bikpela lait bilong God yet i givim lait long taun. Na Pikinini Sipsip em i stap olsem lam bilong taun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The nations of those that are saved will walk in its light. The kings of the earth bring the glory and honor of the nations into it.

block.text: Ol manmeri bilong olgeta lain man bai i wokabaut long lait bilong dispela taun. Na ol king bilong olgeta kantri bilong graun bai i bringim ol gutpela gutpela samting bilong ol i kam long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: On no day will its gates ever be shut, for there will be no night there.

block.text: Long san ol bai i no inap pasim ol dua bilong banis bilong dispela taun. Ol dua bai i op i stap oltaim, long wanem, nait bai i no kamap long dispela taun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The glory and the honor of the nations will be brought into it.

block.text: Olgeta bilas na mani samting bilong olgeta lain man, ol bai i bringim i go insait long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There will in no way enter into it anything profane, or one who causes an abomination or a lie. Only those who are written in the Lamb’s book of life.

block.text: Tasol ol samting i doti na ol man i save mekim ol kain kain pasin nogut na ol man bilong tok giaman, ol bai i no inap i go insait long taun. Nogat tru. Ol manmeri nem bilong ol i stap long buk bilong laip, em buk bilong Pikinini Sipsip, ol tasol inap i go insait long dispela taun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 22
He showed me the river of the water of life, clear as crystal, proceeding out of the throne of God and of the Lamb.

block.text: Orait dispela ensel i soim mi wanpela bikpela wara, em wara bilong givim laip, na em i lait tumas olsem glas. Dispela wara i kamap long sia king bilong God wantaim Pikinini Sipsip, na i ran i go

ReferenceBlocks.text: It ran down the center of the great street of the city. On each side of the river was the tree of life, bearing twelve kinds of fruits, yielding its fruit every month. The leaves of the tree were for the healing of the nations.

block.text: namel tru long bikpela rot bilong taun. Long arere bilong wara, long hap i kam na long hap i go, diwai bilong givim laip i stap. Dispela diwai i save karim kaikai 12 -pela taim long olgeta yia. Em i karim kaikai long olgeta mun. Na ol lip bilong diwai ol i bilong mekim orait ol manmeri bilong olgeta lain man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There will be no curse any more. The throne of God and of the Lamb will be in it, and his servants serve him.

block.text: Na olgeta samting God i no laik tru long en na God i laik rausim, dispela ol samting bai i no i stap moa. taun. Na ol wokman bilong God bai i lotu long em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: They will see his face, and his name will be on their foreheads.

block.text: na ol bai i lukim pes bilong em. Na em bai i raitim nem bilong en long pes bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There will be no night, and they need no lamp light; for the Lord God will illuminate them. They will reign forever and ever.

block.text: Tudak bai i no kamap moa, na lait bilong ol lam na lait bilong san bai i no gat wok moa. Nogat. God, Bikpela bai i givim lait long ol manmeri. Na ol bai i stap king oltaim oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to me,

block.text: Dispela ensel i tokim mi olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “These words are faithful and true. The Lord God of the spirits of the prophets sent his angel to show to his bondservants the things which must happen soon.”

block.text: "Dispela tok em i tru olgeta, inap olgeta man i ken bilip tru long em. God, Bikpela, em i save kirapim spirit bilong ol profet bilong autim tok bilong en, em i bin salim ensel bilong en i kam bilong soim olgeta wokman bilong en long olgeta samting i mas kamap kwiktaim. Na harim. Jisas i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, I come quickly. Blessed is he who keeps the words of the prophecy of this book.”

block.text: 'Bai mi kam long yupela kwiktaim.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I, John, am the one who heard and saw these things. When I heard and saw, I fell down to worship before the feet of the angel who had shown me these things.

block.text: buk, ol i ken amamas.

Mi Jon, mi harim ol dispela tok na mi lukim ol dispela samting. Mi harim pinis na lukim pinis, orait mi brukim skru klostu long lek bilong ensel i bin soim ol dispela samting long mi, na mi laik lotu long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to me,

block.text: Tasol em i tokim mi,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “See you don’t do it! I am a fellow bondservant with you and with your brothers, the prophets, and with those who keep the words of this book. Worship God.”

block.text: "Yu no ken mekim olsem! Mi tu mi wanwok bilong yu wantaim ol brata bilong yu, em ol profet. Na mi wanwok bilong olgeta man i save bihainim tok bilong dispela buk. Yu mas lotu long God wanpela tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to me,

block.text: Na em i tokim mi moa olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don’t seal up the words of the prophecy of this book, for the time is at hand.

block.text: "Dispela tok profet i stap long dispela buk, em yu no ken pasim. Nogat. Taim bilong God i laik mekim ol dispela samting, em i kam klostu pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who acts unjustly, let him act unjustly still. He who is filthy, let him be filthy still. He who is righteous, let him do righteousness still. He who is holy, let him be holy still.”

block.text: Olsem na ol manmeri i save mekim ol pasin nogut, ol i ken go het na mekim ol pasin nogut. Na ol manmeri i save mekim ol pasin i doti, ol i ken go het na mekim ol pasin i doti. Na ol manmeri i save mekim ol stretpela pasin, ol i ken go het na mekim stretpela pasin. Na ol manmeri God i makim bilong em yet na ol i stap holi, ol i ken go het na mekim ol pasin i holi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to me,

block.text: Jisas i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, I come quickly. My reward is with me, to repay to each man according to his work.

block.text: "Harim. Bai mi kam kwiktaim. Na bai mi bringim pe bilong givim long olgeta man. Bai mi bekim pe long olgeta man wan wan, inap long pasin ol i bin mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I am the Alpha and the Omega, the First and the Last, the Beginning and the End.

block.text: Mi tasol mi stap paslain tru na mi stap las tru. Mi stap namba wan tru na mi stap bihain tru. Mi as bilong olgeta samting, na mi save pinisim olgeta wok mi mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Blessed are those who do his commandments, that they may have the right to the tree of life, and may enter in by the gates into the city.

block.text: "Ol manmeri i bin wasim klos bilong ol, ol i ken amamas. Ol inap long kisim kaikai long diwai bilong givim laip. Na ol inap i go insait long ol dua bilong taun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Outside are the dogs, the sorcerers, the sexually immoral, the murderers, the idolaters, and everyone who loves and practices falsehood.

block.text: Ol man bilong mekim ol rabis pasin nogut tru na ol man i save wokim posin na yusim ol arapela kain pawa na ol man i mekim pasin pamuk na ol man i kilim ol man i dai na ol man i lotu long ol giaman god na olgeta man i save laikim pasin giaman na bihainim, dispela olgeta man bai i stap ausait long taun bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I, Jesus, have sent my angel to testify these things to you for the assemblies. I am the root and the offspring of David; the Bright and Morning Star.”

block.text: Mi Jisas, mi bin salim ensel bilong mi i kam long yupela, na em i autim dispela tok long yupela ol manmeri bilong ol sios. Mi tasol mi dispela Kru i kamap long ol lain tumbuna bilong King Devit, na mi Pikinini Bilong Devit. Na mi dispela sta i save lait tumas long moningtaim tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Spirit and the bride say,

block.text: Holi Spirit wantaim meri bilong Pikinini Sipsip tupela i tok,

block.characterId: Holy Spirit, the/bride, the (referring to the Church)

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: Holy Spirit, the/bride, the (referring to the Church)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Come!”

block.text: "Yu kam."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who hears, let him say,

block.text: Na olgeta man i harim dispela tok, ol tu i mas tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Come!”

block.text: "Yu kam."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who is thirsty, let him come. He who desires, let him take the water of life freely.

block.text: Na wanem man nek bilong en i drai, em i mas kam. Man i laik dring, em i mas kam na kisim wara bilong givim laip, em i olsem presen bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I testify to everyone who hears the words of the prophecy of this book, if anyone adds to them, may God add to him the plagues which are written in this book.

block.text: Mi givim strongpela tok long olgeta man i harim dispela tok profet i stap long dispela buk. Sapos wanpela man i skruim narapela tok long dispela tok, orait ol dispela samting nogut tru God i tok long en long dispela buk, em God bai i skruim long ol samting i mas kamap long dispela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone takes away from the words of the book of this prophecy, may God take away his part from the tree of life, and out of the holy city, which are written in this book.

block.text: Na sapos wanpela man i rausim sampela bilong ol dispela tok profet i stap long dispela buk, orait God bai i rausim ol gutpela samting long em. Em bai i no inap kisim kaikai long diwai bilong givim laip, na em bai i no inap i stap long dispela taun bilong God, dispela buk i tok long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who testifies these things says,

block.text: Dispela man i autim tok long dispela olgeta samting, nau em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yes, I come quickly.”

block.text: "Tru tumas, bai mi kam kwiktaim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Amen! Yes, come, Lord Jesus.

block.text: I tru Bikpela Jisas, yu Km.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with all the saints. Amen.

block.text: Marimari bilong Bikpela Jisas em i ken i stap wantaim olgeta manmeri.
